name: Bashed.OS
description: Bashed.os is a Home-Invasion Survival game based on trial-and-error, you must search through a hidden Storage Drive given to you by an anonymous source, and on that Storage Drive comes a brand new Operating System, with an interacting world outside of you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.4GHz Intel/AMD Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: 2GB Graphics, AMD, GeForce, etc Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 3.0GHz Intel/AMD Processing Graphics: 4GB Graphics, AMD, GeForce, etc Storage: 3 GB available space
